analysis.description:
Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#322-346) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- profitOwner.transfer(valueEther) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#342-345)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol:
	Contract GoldenUnitToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#222-228)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Crowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#272-280) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(amount) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#279-280)

Crowdsale.giveTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#280-290) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_newInvestor,value) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#289-290)

Crowdsale.takeTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#291-308) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.acceptTokens(_Investor,value) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#305-307)

Crowdsale.saleTokens (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol)
GoldenUnitToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#182-184)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/38/0x3be99acc6d158b14d5774527ad42629dfdc2100e.sol#12-13) should be declared external
